sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you're riding your <radical>scooter</radical> through some <radical>rice</radical>, it's likely you've gone <kanji>astray</kanji>. Also you might be <kanji>lost</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Usually there aren't paved areas inside areas of rice. You must be really lost if you ended up here with your scooter.
readingMnemonic: You got so <kanji>lost</kanji> and went so <kanji>astray</kanji> you ended up on the <reading>May</reading>flower  (<ja>めい</ja>), a ship that eventually took you across the Atlantic Ocean. Now you've really, really gone astray.
readingInfo: How you got so lost that you ended up on an old ship from 1620 is beyond my understanding. But you did it.
